Title: Semper Fidelis
Plot: After a security breach at the SecNav's residence leads to the death of an ICE agent, Gibbs and the team are forced to work with ICE and the FBI to find his killer. Meanwhile, Tony finally comes face-to-face with Michael Rivkin.
GuestStars: Jaime Murray, Merik Tadros, William Allen Young, Tom Kemp, Jude Ciccolella, Joe Spano
